item.title: Por que você deveria colocar a máscara de oxigênio em si primeiro no avião
item.description:
Por que você deveria colocar a máscara de oxigênio em si primeiro no avião

"Eu não quero morrer". Foi isso que Destin, do canal do YouTube Smarter Every Day, disse quando o nível de oxigênio caiu bastante e ele ficou completamente incapacitado de colocar a máscara de oxigênio nele próprio, pois seu cérebro não estava funcionando como deveria.

item.title: Prisma is now out on Android
item.description:
Prisma is now out on Android

Prisma, the sensationally popular iOS photo manipulation app that's been second only to Pokémon Go in terms of summer hype, has now arrived on Android. The Google Play Store has been plagued by sketchy knockoffs of this excellent new app, so it's a welcome relief to have the authentic app now up and running.

item.title: What Does a Million Dollar Apartment in NYC Look Like?
item.description:
What Does a Million Dollar Apartment in NYC Look Like?

To many of us, a million dollar home sounds like it should be the lap of luxury: marble tubs, game room, wine cellar, perhaps a private pool. But, a million dollars doesn't go quite as far down amenities lane in New York City. So what does a million bucks buy you in Gotham?

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.
